The video has been viewed over 1: 3 million times on Facebook and shared more than 50,000 times, indicating a significant level of attention and potential impact.
The video claims to show Kuwaiti singer: Rashid singing to Sushma Swaraj, an Indian politician and former external affairs minister, suggesting a connection between the two individuals.
The lyrics of the song heard in the vide: which is a controversial and sensitive issue in India.
Through reverse image search and verific: it was found that the video has been doctored and the original footage shows the singer performing a different Indian spiritual song that does not mention a Hindu temple.
